  • Method Details

    • getAll

      ArrayList<League> getAll()
      Retrieves all leagues from the data source.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all leagues.

    • save

      boolean save(League league)
      Saves a league in the data source.
      Parameters:
      league - the league to be saved.
      Returns:
      true if the league is successfully saved, false otherwise.

    • nameUnique

      boolean nameUnique(String name)
      Checks if a league name is unique.
      Parameters:
      name - the league name to check.
      Returns:
      true if the league name is unique, false otherwise.

    • getLeaguesByTeam

      ArrayList<League> getLeaguesByTeam(ArrayList<String> teamNames)
      Retrieves leagues associated with the given team names.
      Parameters:
      teamNames - an ArrayList of team names.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of leagues associated with the teams.

    • deleteLeagues

      boolean deleteLeagues(ArrayList<String> leagues)
      Deletes multiple leagues from the data source.
      Parameters:
      leagues - an ArrayList of league names to delete.
      Returns:
      true if all leagues are successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getTeamsByLeague

      ArrayList<Team> getTeamsByLeague(String leagueName)
      Retrieves teams associated with a league.
      Parameters:
      leagueName - the name of the league.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of teams associated with the league.

    • addTeam

      boolean addTeam(League league, String team)
      Adds a team to a league in the data source.
      Parameters:
      league - the league to add the team to.
      team - the team to add.
      Returns:
      true if the team is successfully added to the league, false otherwise.

    • updateScore

      boolean updateScore(String teamName, String leagueName, int won, int lost, int tied)
      Updates the score for a team in a league.
      Parameters:
      teamName - the name of the team.
      leagueName - the name of the league.
      won - the number of matches won.
      lost - the number of matches lost.
      tied - the number of matches tied.
      Returns:
      true if the score is successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • updateMatchDay

      boolean updateMatchDay(Match match)
      Updates the match day for a match in the data source.
      Parameters:
      match - the match to update.
      Returns:
      true if the match day is successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getNumberTeams

      int getNumberTeams(String league)
      Retrieves the number of teams in a league.
      Parameters:
      league - the name of the league.
      Returns:
      the number of teams in the league.
